Reviews.Title: Pretty good for what it is
Reviews.Author: The Draconic Nabokovian
Reviews.Content: I just spent the day trying out this camera as the backup to my Canon SX40 and as a potential toss in the pocket and go/social outing camera.  I've owned several Sony Cybershots before and in general, they tend to be a great outdoor picture camera and very poor indoors and in low lighting.  After reviewing the day's photos, I've come to the following conclusions:1. First, let's state the obvious.  There's no comparing this quality-wise to the Canon SX40 and nor should there be.  This is a budget compact point and shoot, whereas the SX40 is a bridge camera, frankly the best camera I've ever owned.  That said, the quality is pretty good for its price range from first impressions (I took 43 photos in a variety of conditions, angles and zoom levels.  30 of the 43 I felt good enough quality to upload to my Japan photoblog on Facebook - a pretty good ratio, considering several of the pictures were duplicate efforts at the same shot).2. In particular, this camera's indoor and low-light shooting ability is vastly improved over, oh, pretty much every Cybershot I've ever owned in the past.  Canon will still, in general, outperform Sony in those two categories, but in my mind, this one's a major leap forward for the Sony Cybershot line.3. It's perfect for just throwing in my pocket and traipsing around.  No need to carry the camera bag like with the SX40.  So for that reason and the increased indoor/low-light ability, I'm thinking it will work just fine for going out with friends and all that sort of thing.4. The 10x zoom isn't going to be easy to find in the sub-$200 range, and that's quite honestly probably the biggest reason I got this as my backup camera.  I just wanted a cheap camera that took decent pictures and had at least an 8x zoom.  It fits the bill terrifically there.5. The image stabilization on this camera is *very* good for the price range, in my opinion.  I tend to have shaky hands and only two or three pictures came out with significant blur.Since I've listed the pros, let's go to the cons:1. The single biggest con - THIS IS A VERY SLOW PROCESSING TIME CAMERA.  So if you're the sort who likes to get lots of shots off at once, avoid this camera.  I found it a touch annoying, but since I tend to like to take time to set up my shots anyway, it didn't irritate me quite as much as it might some people.2. For people with large hands like mine, the buttons/etc. can feel somewhat crowded and it may take pressing a second or third time when pushing the on/off button to get it to turn off.3. If you're used to something like the SX40's 35x zoom, the 10x zoom will be something of an adjustment period and a culture shock.  So to be quite honest, if zoom power is a big deal to you, as it is for me, rather than get this camera, I would save up and get the Canon SX40.Overall Verdict:If you're on a budget and either can't afford or don't want to spend $200+ on a camera, or if you're looking for a low-end point and shoot compact you can just stick in your pocket and not have to haul around your primary camera, this is a good camera to get.  It offers a nice all-around game of image quality, stabilization feature, and a decent for the money zoom in a compact, portable package.  Be sure that you can live with the slow processing time, though.  As part of that, do keep in mind that in this range no camera is going to be perfect.  Every one you find for this price ballpark is going to have some drawback to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Fine camera for the average picture-taker like me...
Reviews.Author: Harris M. "NYC-NY"
Reviews.Content: I just came back from a six week trip to Eastern Europe.  I had with me a Sony SteadyShot DSC-T100.  Four weeks ago, in Krakow, Poland, the SteadyShot suddenly died after three years of fairly rugged use.  I went to an electronics store in Krakow and, not having ready access to the Internet, decided to take a chance on the W690, which looked similar to the now-deceased SteadyShot in design and functionality (if you've ever bought an electronic gadget in Europe you know that you simply have to swallow hard and do it since the 23% VAT adds, well, 23% to the price, which even when you have it refunded at the airport, is eaten up by the processing fee).But I digress. I fell in love with this camera.  I am a basic point-and-shoot picture taker.  I am sitting with both cameras in front of me as I write this review.  The 690 is half the weight of the T100, which wasn't all that heavy to begin with, and half as slim as the T100, which wasn't exactly a "pocket pig."  The zoom was extraordinary and the functionality, including basic video, panorama-picture and just plain easy handling was great for a traveler who wants to take a nice shot now and then.  The shot-framing was straightforward.  The low-light quality of the pics was quite fine.  I tried the panorama-shot feature for the first time standing on Castle Hill in Vilnius, Lithuania and was very pleasantly surprised at the ease of the feature and the spectacular shot of the Baroque old town that I now have.  The camera indulged my occasional attempts to get "artsy" with different focus, lighting and framing.I uploaded 500 or so shots to the PC last night and the quality of the pictures is exactly what I had hoped for. If you are a point-and-shooter like me who just wants to take good pictures this camera will be an excellent choice.Now I only have to pick out the 25 shots that my friends and family will be willing to look at.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and returned
Reviews.Author: Steeler Fan
Reviews.Content: I dropped my old Sony camera and it wouldn't power up.  After owning two Sony digital cameras and two Sony camcorders over the years I hoped the DSC W690 would be just as likeable as a replacement. It was not.  To play back a photo to view it immediately would show "Accessing" on the screen first for several seconds.  This is annoying and my prior cameras did not do this. Using in autofocus mode for anything moving was also a problem.  By the time the shutter snapped, the subject was gone or out of focus.  We are talking a person processing by at a wedding, not a race car flying by.  I returned the camera for a refund and got a Panasonic Lumix SZ7 that we are very happy with.  Sorry, Sony.  I tried to be faithful.

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera For The Price
Reviews.Author: B. Salisbury
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my Parents to replace an aging camera. Bought it at a great price and was really happy with the output of both the pictures and video on this camera. Not as good as my higher priced Sony, but very nice all the same. I am use to the Sony menus on my camera and this one was not much different, except that it has less options, therefor a simpler menu. I set it in Intelligent mode and showed them how to zoom, how to switch back and forth from video mode, press the shutter button, and how to view the files and they were good to go...

Reviews.Title: Great Value for price
Reviews.Author: xxeno
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and for the price you definitely can't go wrong. Images taken on the one I bought were great quality and pretty sharp. Zoom on the optical 10x was decent but not the best, but the auto-focus compensates enough. The soft skin mode to me just seems to blur the images a little by using a soften effect like what you get on some editing software.Image stabilization is decent as expected from Sony and video is decent at 30 fps on 720p, but doesn't adjust focus as fast as I would have liked for some scenes. I suggest using a class 10 card in it for smooth video and expect it to fill up fast if you're using it at maximum settings/resolution. The flash is ok, though I'd prefer to have good lighting anyway to get natural shot and have a real sense of the environment although depending on your angle, it will seem to get a dark shot if the light source is behind the object or person you're shooting, but it does compensate a little.If you're a point a click person I suggest you leave settings on auto and just go with it. The camera does a great job of scene recognition and adjusts to suit and as we all know, digital zoom is a waste of time, so don't think you'll get a high quality pic at a long distance as their cameras tend to pixelate images when using digital zoom  . Anything within 30 feet is sharp, after that you start having to really work for that quality image. Close-ups are good and most are clean. Some colours look forced, on some plants very saturated on some deep colours (bright coloured ones were fine), and some other stuff I mentioned above are better on other cameras within the price range although not thrown together like on this model. Don't expect great low light pics but some are passable depending on the light available.So it is worth a buy? In my opinion yes, as long as you don't expect too much for a budget price and aren't going to be snapping underwater pics and video (don't get it wet, and if you do, switch off, remove batteries and memory card and dry immediately and thoroughly), It's a bit smooth to touch and does feel sometimes like it'll fall out your hand, but is pretty comfortable otherwise and works well. So as a budget camera, you could do worse!

Reviews.Title: Just keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Vivi
Reviews.Content: This is at least the third Sony Cybershot that I have personally owned and it's the best yet.  My previous generation was great but I lost it prior to an important trip and figured if I had to buy another that I should go ahead and upgrade.  I am so delighted that I did....almost makes me glad that I lost the old camera.  The increased zoom is astounding for such a little camera if your object on the other end is still.  Night shots without the flash are amazing.  New panorami feature is fun.  Not sure how many applications to use it for.  Only criticism is that the switch between photos, video and panoramic slides way too easily and you wind up in the wrong mode often.

Reviews.Title: 10X Zoom is great!
Reviews.Author: Joy C. Vlad
Reviews.Content: I bought this specifically for the 10X zoom and that is wonderful. The other features are almost as good as the W635 i bouught last year.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for amateurs
Reviews.Author: Teresa White
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera for my mom who's in her 70's.  She needed something easy to understand and use that also takes good pictures.  This is a great little camera, just what she needed.  I also bought one for myself since it's so portable and easy to use.  It takes great pictures (I use it at my son's sporting events).

Reviews.Title: This camera is useless to me..
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Functions way too slow for normal use.Takes 5 seconds for shutter to open when pressing the button and another 5 seconds to reload..

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Cruisefan
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying this camer locally , it is amazing, takes videos , awesome pictures, small portable, loooooove ithighly recommend andy of the cyber shot dsc cameras

Reviews.Title: This one replaced an older model I dropped.
Reviews.Author: Doreatha
Reviews.Content: We just purchased a 50X optical zoom by Cannon for our vacation photos outside which is big and bulky but needed a pocket camera when we don't want to carry or need something with such a high optical zoom.  Having purchased Sony products in the past, this upgrade is proving to be a great camera for the price.  So far we love it.

Reviews.Title: Manual is incorrect
Reviews.Author: Grammie Gin
Reviews.Content: For those of you having trouble setting this camera up - the manual I have was wrong in the steps on page 13. It said when you turn the camera on for the first time the date and time will appear. This is incorrect. The language mode shows up first. In order to select the proper language you need to select it - and then SCROLL down to click the okay. The manual does not tell you this. Once that is done the geographical location will show up and then the date and time section. When I called and spoke to the tech at SONY he made it seem as this should have been intuative to me. Well - if I'm supposed to guess how things work SONY why did you even bother with the set up in the manual? Now that it is up and running finally it is time to go see if it was worth the aggravation with the tech!

Reviews.Title: Camera okay
Reviews.Author: Mary Steele
Reviews.Content: This camera is  okay for what I need it for. I have had better and bigger cameras, but this one will do.  I like the size of it because it will fit in my purse easily.

Reviews.Title: great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Picklewacket
Reviews.Content: the profile is small enough to fit in my hand when walking the streets of foreign countries, and not call attention to itself, but its powerful enough to give me some great shots!

Reviews.Title: Blurry Photos
Reviews.Author: BearbullMM
Reviews.Content: I took about 50 photos at various zooms and noticed that the colors are all bunched and there is no depth or object clarity.I own a HX200V and a waterproof TX20 and happy with them.  I bought this for my wife as she is travelling alone and would love a point-n-shoot.I wish I had this from Amazon as I never had any issues with Amazon.  Unfortunately, I bought this from Sony Store and now I have to pay for return shipping and then keep my fingers crossed so they don't charge me re-stocking fees.Love Amazon as I have been a customer for 12 years and they have always treated me well.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Rudy Gostischa
Reviews.Content: This is a great point and shoot camera with options that make it even more valuable.  I took it to Vegas on a vacation shortly after getting it and it worked admirably. I had not had a chance to read the manual but that didn't matter much.  You will enjoy this camera, especially if you just want to take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Colleen P Henderson
Reviews.Content: Just used this camera in Paris for 10 days, and easily posted my pictures on facebook everynight! Also sent photos easily via email to family members!Great distance photoing! Recommend this camera and amazon! Thanks a lot!

Reviews.Title: Clear, small and HD
Reviews.Author: bellamu47
Reviews.Content: Wooow!!!! I would 100% reccomend this product to anyone. It is tiny, captures pictures really well, has a smile detector there's just something distinctively different about this camera. You should get it!!! The red color tops it up as it's unique and classy.

Reviews.Title: Compact and great details
Reviews.Author: TEM
Reviews.Content: I have a big EOS type camera so buying this small for spur of the momment pictures,which have great detail for small camera such as this one!

Reviews.Title: convenient for fast shoot with high optical zoom camera
Reviews.Author: Dejun
Reviews.Content: very nice digital camera which can bring far view close to your eye. Sweep Panorama photo sometime can not give the right combination.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: SM
Reviews.Content: It's just what I expected as it replaced an older model Sony camera. The online guide is nice although using the programming it is somewhat cumbersome. Oh and the pictures come out great.

Reviews.Title: Good..
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: Is Very good, thank you. I like it. My new photos are sharper and the view is great. I congratulate you, keep doing better cameras.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Porath
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a compact camera that was simple to use and would take great pictures....and this camera was it! I also was happy that you had a color selection, and the price was great too. I will be telling everyone I know who is looking for a camera that Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: should have read the fine print
Reviews.Author: tpajen
Reviews.Content: i can't review the actual camera yet because i apparently did not read the fine print - there is no memory stick with this camera.  not even a crappy tiny one.  i now have to go purchase one separately before i can use it.  i absolutely expected to have to purchase MORE memory, but did not expect to get a digital camera that cannot be used right out of the box.  i anticipate that the camera itself will be perfectly fine once it's usable.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: its me
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera, very small and cute. Runs out of battery fairly easy. I bought a second battery fairly cheap and have been fine ever since. Personally I don't like the software and it it pretty confusing to use. I have my own photo gallery so I just deleted it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: momofive
Reviews.Content: About a year ago I purchased a more expensive upgrade to previously owned Canon cameras and was very disappointed.  I have always liked Canon cameras, but really hated the last one I purchased which was a Powershot SX210 IS.  The pictures always were extremely over exposed and often blurry.  I could never seem to get the nice shots I had experienced previously with my other canon cameras.  I decided to try out a few other cameras.  I continued to look into Canons, but the several I tried I was still very disappointed with the picture quality!  Finally I decided to look outside the Canon realm and I tried this Sony Cybershot and I have loved it!  It has been very dependable and I always get nice crisp pictures!  I love the videos and I love that you can still shoot pictures while taking video.  It is a really nice compact size. Not bulky, but still something to hold onto and not easy to drop. Obviously the price is nice and you are getting a great point and shoot, easy to use camera, which is exactly what I was looking for!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: The Mike 61
Reviews.Content: Love it!!  Great camera at a great price.Arrived on time in perfect shape.It is easy to use and has a lot of features for such a low price!!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Riss
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for me. I mostly use it for taking pictures of my young children, and it suits my needs perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Canton Guy
Reviews.Content: It was an expensive camera for the quality. The lens makes a click noise when it comes out or goes in. Don't like that. The picture quality is also not good on flash. Creates a yellowish image at night on white. Color is an issue. If you have the money, and do not mind a regular DSLR, go for that. Get a Canon or Nikon. This is only good for daylight pics and when you need a small camera that will fit in your back pocket. No more. EXPENSIVE.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Dnice1
Reviews.Content: I love it, this camera takes great photos, you may have to adjust the resolution because they are sooooo big that it takes a minute to be able to review them. But other than that small delay, it works great.

Reviews.Title: I have been scammed
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: My order was for the Sony DSC-W690 camera and instead the seller send the Sony DSC-W710 camera.  It is an abuse that a product is offered and send another for the same value.  I am in Ecuador and it is very difficult to return the product for customs policies.  I hope a solution.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Marite
Reviews.Content: Everything I wanted! Great value for a great camera, very easy tu use and excellent pictures and quality! Very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Ruined my cruise photos :(
Reviews.Author: Lil One
Reviews.Content: I could not be more unhappy with this purchase. I bought this camera to take on a once in a lifetime cruise. The small size and simple point/shoot operation were quite attractive to me.The camera worked fine for the first day of my trip. By Day 2, it developed a black spot that showed up in any photos that were zoomed in to any degree. A number of my photos are ruined as a result.I am a diehard Amazon shopper and generally very happy with everything that I buy, but this was a most disappointing purchase.

Reviews.Title: You are my #1 man and the best I could ever ask for! :)
Reviews.Author: chantelle
Reviews.Content: I loved it babe :) The best I could have ever got and it will bring many memories ;) You mean the world to me ;)

Reviews.Title: Sony is the Greatest!!
Reviews.Author: ptcoke2
Reviews.Content: I owned one of these but older model so i thought it was time to up grade to a newer model and this one is so HOT!!! I just LOVE IT I don't think i would have any other model besides SONY!!!

Reviews.Title: roger venezuela 2013
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: very good I recommend it all came as I was a bit slow charm thanks but I congratulate taste good sellers

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jessica Piper
Reviews.Content: When I got this Sony cyber camera, I was playing with it and I love it. I just went to a concert couple of days ago n the hp 720 video camera is awesome. I can see the video clearly and I cant beat the price... I will keep on shopping on amazon

Reviews.Title: Soy Cyper-shot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Elvis Kelly
Reviews.Content: I'm one of those people who are technologically challenged.  I don't want a camera with so many "bells and whistles" that I could never figure out how to use it.  This is the perfect camera for someone like me.  It's so easy to use, compact and easy to carry, yet does have several "bells and whistles" for those who want to use them.  If you want simple, you have it in this camera.  If you want more sophisticated features, you also have them in this camera.  However, the more sophisticated features do not prevent you from simple "point and shoot" photography.

Reviews.Title: very friendly and very efficient thanks
Reviews.Author: Yaritza Chacon
Reviews.Content: very friendly and very efficient thanks indeed very happy with the product are excellent sellers all perfect and no complaints hamables demaciado excuse the tardansa for qualification but are actually very efficient thanks. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Julie L. Tilley
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for our needs.We use a camara to document all sorts of things. Easy to download to computer.Delivery was on schedule.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas Devries "bigdoug"
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow to get ready for the next photo but it takes great photos like it like it

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn Denis
Reviews.Content: It did not take me long to pick this camera out of all of the cameras displayed.  It is small so it is easy to keep in my pocket so I can use it whenever I want.

Reviews.Title: Camera extraordinarie
Reviews.Author: ve140709 Juan Portillo
Reviews.Content: excelent for me,  it is practical for my work because i'm electrician, it is very easy its functional, thanks very much

Reviews.Title: Big Fan
Reviews.Author: chakla
Reviews.Content: I have always been a big fan of Sony Cyber-shot cameras. This is probably the 4th if not 5th Sony Cyber-shot I have owned. I replace them every 12-18 months because the technology improves year over year. Photography has been a hobby of mine for over 20 years back to when film was used in cameras.I really endorse Sony Cyber-shot because of the ergonomics of the camera. I one time switched to Nikon and did not like how had to adjust the different modes through a menu and not a hard button on the camera you can slide up and down to change. You can easily change between photo, panoramic and movie modes on the Cyber-shot. The Nikon didn't take as good quality of the photos as the Sony. This camera takes beautiful photos. I have enlarged the prints to 11x14 and framed them in 16x20 frames in my office. Customers come in and marvel at the beauty of the photo and ask where I took the picture and what camera was used. I tell them it was just a simple point and shoot digital camera and they cannot believe it. The zoom on this camera is a 10x optical zoom. Most cameras are just 5x or 8x, but this one is 10x. I don't zoom often but it is a good zoom.The size of the camera is perfect for every occasion. I take this camera on all of my vacations and it documents my memories. It easily fits in my pocket during travel or I will use the strap to put around my wrist.Definitely recommend and will definitely be a repeat customer to Sony Cyber-shot for the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald V. Perrone "Ronald Perrone"
Reviews.Content: I like it because it is a point and shoot camera and it automatically takes care of the details such as flash..

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: R. R. H.
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smaller camera for everyday use that has good features. I have not learned all the features as of yet but get great shots with a basic knowledge of this camera. One day I will have to read the entire manual.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Michael Barnes
Reviews.Content: Took it with me to Alaska- great small camera- pictures as good as I am.I do recommend this item for those who do not want to schlep a large camera.

Reviews.Title: basic camera, excellent price
Reviews.Author: Ruth Sherman
Reviews.Content: It's your basic digital camera and the price is excellent.  I find it easy to use and light to carry.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific camera from sony. It has a lot of features and it is easy to comprehend. When it comes to space, it is good to have something like New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!. Needless to say, this is a great camera from Sony.

Reviews.Title: Top Notch
Reviews.Author: Cole Price
Reviews.Content: As always Sony manufactures superior cameras at a low price.  I've always bought Sony electronics and this camera is the last in a long line of purchases that have never dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: What could be better?
Reviews.Author: Tom C
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my mostly technology illiterate wife and it has been worth every penny.  Fits in her pocket, goes everywhere, takes great pictures with very little user input and she can do her own downloads.  I couldn't have asked for more.

Reviews.Title: horrible camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Finley
Reviews.Content: this camera when you turned it on to the actual time to be able to use teh camera was counting 30 seconds. I was waiting to wait to take a photo! I would never use this camera and sent it back after 2 days of having it! Never buy this version!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy Groom "horselover"
Reviews.Content: I had another sony cyber shot but I was taking a picture of one of my horses and another one came up behind me and broke it. so I picked this one., it is awesome. it has the instruction built in the camera. that is a very good thing for you do not have to carry a instruction book with you. still trying to figure out how to work the instructions though. that would be the only downfall to this camera.

Reviews.Title: Gift Purchase
Reviews.Author: martie bell
Reviews.Content: This camera was for a birthday gift and for the price it was everything expected or wanted.  Sony makes great products so I knew we probably couldn't go wrong but this worked out even better for all.Thanks for the great prices and shipping went off without a hitch too.

Reviews.Title: This camera will not disappoint
Reviews.Author: redwatts "Richard"
Reviews.Content: I had had one of  these cyber-shot for years and then I accidentally damaged it (not the camera's fault). I wanted to be able to use the card and battery so I bought another one but this one is even better.  I have a 8 Gig card and it holds 1100 pictures I think that is medium resolution. This camera has lots of options but it is simple to operate, you don't have to read a 80 page manual to take pictures. it has good battery life but I do recommend a 2nd battery.

Reviews.Title: A very good option
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert, so, I don't understand the technical, but this camera is "very intelligent" and super easy to use it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Alexander Molina
Reviews.Content: Love it!!! Easy to use, so far a great product for the money, so I recommend it. Nice brand too.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera but would be better if heavier.
Reviews.Author: Eugene Curley
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of good features and I haven't used all of them as yet but the only problem we have is for older people, it is very light and hard to hold still when clicking the picture

Reviews.Title: Sharp clear outdoor pictures!
Reviews.Author: Dunncorrado
Reviews.Content: I take modeling pictures of my daughter and I started off with this camera. This is a great little camera that provides sharp clear pictures. Although, it's down fall is indoor pictures. This, camera is not suitable for indoor pictures. The lightning in a house doesn't give enough light. The pictures will come out dark and blurry. If you are looking for a good outdoor camera then this is it. Also, action shots are good with this camera because you can manually set it to what you need. I have shot my son jumping onto a tree trunk and bouncing off...clear, crisp photo. Add a little editing and you have a photo that looks pro.

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: jkh
Reviews.Content: Works great and easy to figure out, priced reasonably.My only issue is the complete manual had to be downloaded from the internet, I hate that they do not supply a complete manual.

Reviews.Title: La mejor cámara!!!
Reviews.Author: Wilmer Paez
Reviews.Content: Esta cámara es súper buena!!! sencillamente espectacular! las fotos son perfectas y la opción de tomar fotos panorámicas es muy buena.

Reviews.Title: Хорошо
Reviews.Author: ALEX
Reviews.Content: Работает хорошо, но требует небольших доработок, например, резкость видео, а также снимков не всегда успевает зафиксировать четко, особенно при движении

Reviews.Title: Small and compact but disappointing image quality
Reviews.Author: Jacky Goh
Reviews.Content: It is really a small and nicely design camera but the image quality is really disappointing.The LCD resolution i can only rate it 6/10

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Rene Ydler N.
Reviews.Content: good product, great menu, easy operation.It comes with charger and USB cable, but it dont include A/V cable how old sony DSC cameras

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: José León
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, fotografías de primera calidad a un bajo costorecomedado 100%sin lugar a dudas con los ojos cerrados  una buena alternativa

Reviews.Title: Thanks a product nuy exclente
Reviews.Author: Lol
Reviews.Content: Thanks a product nuy exclente and recommend good quality and store that sold it to me excellent service and attention

Reviews.Title: Not a great camera at all
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I like this camera due to it being very small and lightweight. It is horrible at taking pictures. the auto camera mode setting when using the flash is like putting a huge flood light up in front of what you're a taking a picture of.Everything is white so I am not impressed at all and it doesn't get any better or easier to setup with all the settings it has... not much of a point and shoot camera if you ask me I would not recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good for it size
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Motta
Reviews.Content: I have two of this kind. They are very portable and gives me the kind of snaps shots I like to have.

Reviews.Title: Good product / good price
Reviews.Author: Julio R. Mendez "Book Eater"
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with this camera. It is compact, good quality, easy to use, beautiful and the price is according with all the features it offers.

Reviews.Title: good picts
Reviews.Author: Joedirt
Reviews.Content: very good picts and the camera is very easy to use. Has lots of settings if you prefer to set them yourself but the easy picture setting seems to work the best as it is.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jay Andover
Reviews.Content: Have had 3 of these cameras in varying generations/resolution capabilities. They are fantastic for the price and ease of a point and shoot handy camera -- nice go-to in addition to Iphone cameras

Reviews.Title: Sleek Design
Reviews.Author: LaceyMom
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to replace our very old Cyber-Shot that recently stopped functioning. This new and improved version is slim and easy to transport. It fits in a small purse even with the case. It is convenient and easy to use. So far, the picture quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: Una excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Daniel Arguelles
Reviews.Content: Soy de Venezuela, y la pedi por medio de un casillero en Miami, y aun asi con seguridad llego en perfecto estado y funcional.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: pezcristiano
Reviews.Content: very nice product, excellent working features, i love its versatile design and easy to operate, you will love the nice pictures...

Reviews.Title: CAMERA SUPER NICE
Reviews.Author: rf
Reviews.Content: A very nice camera, super handy, sharp pics and videos plus affordable.So fine for parties and big events. Like it much

Reviews.Title: would buy again
Reviews.Author: earl
Reviews.Content: like every camera they all have their neat features easy to use read the book to get the most from your camera compact

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Gopi
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my friend, i love sony product very much. Black cyber shot looks very handy. Only thing that is concerning me was with the given price i did not get any bundle offer, not even a camera bag or camera strap.

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera
Reviews.Author: Karin G
Reviews.Content: I just returned this camera to the store and ordered a new (different brand) camera online....the Sony camera took horrible pictures when in zoom mode...night pictures of Christmas lights were blurry and had a halo effect.  The flash didn't even work have the time when I used it inside (and yes, it was set to be on).  Autofocus is EXTREMELY slow! Also, the panoramic pictures has large grey areas on the sides even when I moved the camera the entire way around 360 degrees!  I do NOT recommend this camera for anyone....if I could give it negative stars, I would

Reviews.Title: Sony cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoon
Reviews.Author: Helen Dombruski
Reviews.Content: So far, I'm very pleased with my purchase.  I'm still learning all of its features. I especially like when it tells me if someone blinked!  I can do another picture immediately.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: GT "G T"
Reviews.Content: I have lots of Sony Electronics.  They never disappoint. This model is perfect for shooting photos of my grandson at his basketball games using the 10x optical.

Reviews.Title: christmas gift
Reviews.Author: L. Kushman
Reviews.Content: THis was a gift for CHristmas so I haven't got to use it a lot yet, but so far I LOVE it!  It is small enough to fit in my purse or bag which is a big plus to me

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Brenda J. Austin "Kindle lover"
Reviews.Content: I love the quality and I really wanted blue and this is the only place I could find the color I wanted.  I tried to find it at the big box stores, but they only had it available in the standard silver.  This one matched their sale price, and I got the color I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Came right on time
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Cross
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for a family member and they loved it. It was simple and easy to use. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: clarity of the camera is not good and steady.. few images will be good... many will not good. not consistent image clarity
Reviews.Author: ddharshansm
Reviews.Content: Not consistent image clarityclarity of the camera is not good and steadyfew images will be goodTheir is blur while taking the image

Reviews.Title: Terrific Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera from sony. I've gotten some great shots with this camera. The resolution in the images are outstanding. Plus, with a memory card like New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, I can take as many as I want without worrying about space. Aside from that, I recommend this camera. It really is great.

Reviews.Title: Bad pictures Bad product.
Reviews.Author: Phillip W. Trimbath
Reviews.Content: I had a comparable Nikon that unfortunately went for a swim. I bought this thinking "sony, how bad can it be?"Pretty bad. Under any lighting it takes really inferior pictures, and the battery that comes with it lasts about an hour and it's done. Then you have to remove it and place it in a docking station. Very inconvenient.Bottom line, it's a poor product compared to comparably priced models from Canon or Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent article
Reviews.Author: Alexander Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: An article of top quality and utility... An article of top quality and utility... and easy to use with quality materials for life and 100% recommended ...

Reviews.Title: i
Reviews.Author: Ernst Georges
Reviews.Content: Its very nice when u see it, but for a Sony camera, its bad, its not easy to make picture with it at night, Image is not good, for a 16.1 mp, they can do better than that.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: The Sherwood's
Reviews.Content: Camera was a Christmas gift for our son. He has been thrilled with the features and the camera takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690
Reviews.Author: Celieste
Reviews.Content: Just love it!  Very easy to use and wonderful pictures.  Easy to upload onto the computer and everywhere else.  Great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Jota Gaitan
Reviews.Content: It's exacted what I was expecting. Very good resolution. It's small and powerful. It is very easy to manage, and all the funtion are more ghat enough that you needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera too new to review thoroughly yet.
Reviews.Author: James A. ReMalia
Reviews.Content: So far, I like it very much. However, I have only used it a couple of times since it was a Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Dr. Genao
Reviews.Content: I consider this item because it is exactly what I want.it great and arrive on time.good price, good brand, etc.

Reviews.Title: Sony disappointed me
Reviews.Author: Vivek
Reviews.Content: Ok, I bought this camera last week (2 days ago my first child was born), was excited to take pics of the baby with new camera. The only reason I selected this model was the 10x optical zoom feature which I thought was awesome. I liked the slim look of the camera but when I started using it, the happiness didn't last long.First of all, when you switch it to playback mode to view the pics, it takes like 5-8 seconds to load the images from memory.(shows message "Accessing images" on a blank screen), especially when you are indoors and wants to verify the pic quality, its annoying to wait 5+ seconds every single time to view the pic.I had the same issue with my last Sony camera which I bought as a gift for my mom.The other 2 canon which I owned previously didn't had this issue. Also the indoor pic quality in dim light is very poor even though I took pics on max resolution with the flash ON.The main reason I am returning it today is because the ON/OFF switch doesn't operate properly.Once you turn it OFF and turn it back ON again, it takes about 4-7 press on the power button before it turns back ON.(what the hell is going on with a brand new Sony camera after 2 days of use), my wife noticed it first, I ignored her since she is not great with electronic stuff, then 2 days later I experienced the same behavior and was mad the thing won't turn back on at all even after 3-4 tries. THAT'S IT, I AM DONE!!! I owned 2 canon and 2 sony before, even the canon I bought in 2005 still performs better than this one,no delay to view the pics in playback mode. No more Sony for me. And also just a heads up, the user manual looks like made out of tissue paper (that too the one you finds in dollar store), Sony is trying to save money in all means they can.Also, this model doesn't have an option to "delete all" images from the memory. Either you have to select each one of them and delete or delete by specific dates, so if you have over 500 images and want to delete all of them, you have to delete them date wise, 1 day at a time which is weird. My older canon(2005 model) had a "delete all" feature. Sony is so lame...My local BB didn't had this model on store, the return would have been easier that way with full refund.Now I am paying $8.09 for shipping thru UPS. Should be careful while buying electronic stuff through internet.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Richard Perez
Reviews.Content: very goodi vove itit is what i wantso nicei like itthans so muchit is great

Reviews.Title: Problems with the camera
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: After uploading pictures, I have lines in the pictures.  Not the computer or software seems to be a camera issuue.

Reviews.Title: Had everything I wanted feature wise but...
Reviews.Author: Danelle L Marker
Reviews.Content: My W290 takes way better quality pix than this camera. I wanted this to replace my W290 solely becuz of the 10x zoom. But, def not worth it. I'm trying something else....and keeping my W290.

Reviews.Title: packaging open
Reviews.Author: L. fulginiti "linda"
Reviews.Content: The product was fine, but the outside package was open. The camera  was given as a gift, the recipient loves it. sony has finally moved to to an sd card.

Reviews.Title: La cámara no funcionó
Reviews.Author: Antonio Torres D.
Reviews.Content: Lamentablemente la cámara nunca funcionó, aunque la caja estuvo en buen estado, la cámara no funcionó,cuando lo revisó el servicio técnico Sony vio que la tarjeta principal estaba rota, lo cual tiene un costo igual al de la cámara en si misma, una pésima experiencia

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Nieves Barrera
Reviews.Content: Muy buen tiempo de entrega, la cámara llego en excelentes condiciones. La cámara cumplió todas mis expectativas y más. Es ideal para quien no tiene mucho conocimientos en fotografías como yo, la máquina saca las fotos prácticamente sola. Me encanta la función de foto panorámica. Muy buena relación costo-beneficio. La recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: wrong camera
Reviews.Author: kbarkley
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera had a touch screen. I read reviews and thought I had checked it out carefully. I was so disappointed that there is no touch screen. My other Sony (touch screen technology) was stolen and even though I had to pay $150.00 to have it repaired at one point I loved the camera. Will probably end up giving this to a grand child as a first camera. This is why I don't like ordering on line. I know it was my fault for not reading more carefully but I thought it was a "given" that it had a touch screen.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE CAMERA; HORRIBLE SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Ping Porsche
Reviews.Content: WHY CAN'T I GIVE NEGATIVE STARS?DON'T BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER SONY CAMERA!!!!!Sony makes crap cameras and their support will accuse you of breaking it.Purchase from a respectable camera maker like Canon, Nikon, or Fuji.I bought this for snorkeling and it corrupted my memory card on the first trip.OK, $10,000 trip with no pictures, because the camera corrupted the memory.Called Sony and they blamed the memory.Got two new memory cards for the next trip.OK, new trip, $5k trip with no pictures because the entire stupid camera craps out.Called Sony, no apologies, no emergency loaner, just a send it in with the receipt so we can verify it's still under warranty.Sent the camera in to the depot, on my own dime.They call and accused me of opening the camera door.What idiots! Why the hell would I do that? So I can ruin my pictures?  TWICE????!!!!!I contacted all the way up to national customer support.All idiots along the way.They didn't do a user test underwater.They just dunk it and say it's still WATER-RESISTANT, so it must be user error.F#$% OFF SONY!!!!Whatever you do, buy something else and save your money, this is a horrible product, that takes horrible pictures and is slow as mud, with a horrible touchscreen that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 MP Digital Camera - Lemon?
Reviews.Author: Ramon Wells
Reviews.Content: Hated this camera. Although, I have to give credit to Amazon & Circuit City (where it was purchased) for promptly and without any drama, reimbursing my account. I have owned 5 Cybershots prior to this one and had been trying to buy this particular one for several weeks after I had dropped my previous one, but was unavailable (pre-order). In the end, I was excited to finally get it. I like the size of Cybershots and the simplicity, but in this case, the photos were horrible. Not to say that I might've gotten a lemon, but I wasn't going to take another chance.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1 megapixels Super HAD CCD image sensor
10X optical zoom
3.0-inch LCD
720p MP4 HD Movie Mode
Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360°
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W690 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Silver) (2012 Model)
